text: Officials of the Education Department have begun an inquiry into the holiday declared to Panchayat Union Middle School in Jalakandapuram on February 17 and 18. The headmistress declared holiday for two days and the same was passed as resolution by the school education committee. Villagers said that no local festival occurred on those days. The headmistress declared holiday for her to attend her daughter’s marriage in Chennai.
title: Inquiry begins
